comment: A skier pauses on a mountaintop .
A rock climber pauses to look out over the ocean .
A man rock climbing pauses to calculate his route .
Two men pause on a rock while hiking in barren terrain .
Two people have paused near a table and chairs to examine something at their feet in front of a tudor style building .
A retail professional pauses while interacting with customers .
A football player pauses during a game .
Construction is paused after steamroller flattens the ground .
A cook in a green apron pauses for a moment beside an outdoor grill .
The traveller pauses in front of the mountain view .
A mother and daughter pause their Monopoly game long enough to smile at the camera .
Two people carrying water bottles pause at a market stall .
An attractive young New York City policewoman pauses on the sidewalk .
Two men with red shirts and yellow aprons stand in front of a wall of colorful stuffed animals while two women pause at the table in front of it .
Blond tennis player pauses to view the crowd .
A young man pauses to examine the image on his camera .
A young child wearing a striped pastel shirt pauses on the sidewalk while eating her soft-serve ice cream with rainbow sprinkles on top .
An elderly gentleman pauses for a photograph .
A woman dressed in white pauses while reading her book .
Seven hikers pause on a path while their leader directs their attention ahead .
A boy pauses in drawing on a white balloon to smile at the camera , and the girl next to him also smiles at the camera .
A rollerblader pauses at the top of a skate ramp .
A male paused in thought while painting a picture .
Young saxophone players wait during a pause in a performance .
A boy wearing a helmet pauses on the ground while rollerblading .
An older man in shorts , showing healthy-looking legs , astride a bicycle , pauses at an intersection
Soccer players pause a game because a player in white uniform is hurt on the field .
A construction worker pauses to wipe sweat from his brow .
A young girl wearing a heavy blue coat pauses to look at the ripples her foot has made in a puddle on a paved road .
A woman in a black dress crosses the street while the other woman with a mobile phone on her ear pauses while crossing the street .
In a black leather coat , a man waiting for the subway to come pauses to look up from his book to check the oncoming track .
A young woman in green sunglasses pauses while sketching outside .
A house painter in clothes covered in paint pauses to look at the camera .
A man in a violet sweater and black brimmed hat pauses on a crowded sidewalk to take a photo of the photographer .
A man an woman pause while walking up stone steps so she can show him photos on a digital camera .
A group of people pause to review a painting at a museum .
A couple on a silver scooter pause near a group of four people on the street .
Three hikers pause while one takes out a cellphone device .
A young blond , male tourist in an orange shirt , carrying his camera , pauses on a busy sidewalk .
A woman pauses to look at a window display where an extremely over-sized black , tan , and white beagle that 's licking its nose is framed between two mannequins wearing tan jackets and blue jeans .
Two athletic-looking young men with wet hair and wearing swimming trunks appear to pause after a swimming event .
Three friends pause for a photo by the water .
A dog pauses in the bushes .
A lady with red-hair and a white jacket pauses to look at her shopping list in the milk section of a grocery store .
A fisherman pauses to look into the camera as he works with his catch .
The couple pauses atop a rocky overlook .
The truck driver pauses for a photo opportunity .
A woman is paused in a crowd , as she carries a tray on her head .
A hiker in snowshoes out for a walk in the snow pauses to look at the camera .
A lady that has been performing on stage with a mic and guitar pauses to kiss the head of a child .
A worker pauses while clearing vegetation .
A costumed Asian man pauses for a picture at a reenactment .
Two men are running in some sort of marathon , one man pauses while running to wipe the sweat from his face .
Female musician pauses her guitar playing to enjoy a moment during a performance .
A competitive biker pauses on the course .
A man in a blue plaid shirt and blue jeans , wearing a black helmet , pauses to drink water next to a large blue steel corrugated tube .
Three kayakers in helmets and life vests held in place by their oars in a river pause for a photo opportunity with one kayak perpendicularly over another the third apart .
A smiling fireman pauses in his work to pose for a camera .
A pause in a speech at the Baseball Hall of Fame caused by , what appears to be , an emotional moment .
Two players pause to enjoy the moment .
Construction worker pauses to speak with coworker in a building undergoing construction .
